name: limacharlie-skills
description: Comprehensive collection of specialized Skills for working with LimaCharlie's SecOps Cloud Platform, including endpoint detection and response, cloud security monitoring, threat hunting, and incident response.
author: LimaCharlie

skills.name: D&R Rule Builder
skills.description: Create, test, and validate Detection & Response (D&R) rules with proper YAML syntax, operators, unit tests, and stateful detection patterns

skills.name: Sensor Manager
skills.description: Deploy, configure, and manage LimaCharlie endpoint sensors across Windows, macOS, Linux, Chrome, and Edge platforms

skills.name: Adapter Configurator
skills.description: Set up and configure adapters to ingest telemetry from 40+ data sources including cloud platforms, SIEMs, and log sources

skills.name: LCQL Query Builder
skills.description: Write and optimize LimaCharlie Query Language (LCQL) queries for searching historical event data and conducting investigations

skills.name: Output Configurator
skills.description: Configure outputs to route telemetry to SIEMs, data lakes, and analytics platforms

skills.name: Artifact Collector
skills.description: Collect and manage forensic artifacts including files, memory dumps, logs, and PCAP data

skills.name: Incident Responder
skills.description: Execute incident response workflows using LimaCharlie's containment, investigation, and remediation capabilities

skills.name: Threat Hunter
skills.description: Conduct proactive threat hunting using LCQL queries, event analysis, and behavioral detection patterns

skills.name: YARA Manager
skills.description: Create, test, and deploy YARA rules for malware detection across endpoints

skills.name: Extension Developer
skills.description: Build custom LimaCharlie extensions to integrate external tools and APIs

skills.name: API Integrator
skills.description: Use LimaCharlie REST API and SDKs (Python/Go) for automation and integration

skills.name: Playbook Automator
skills.description: Design and implement automated response playbooks and workflows

skills.name: Stateful Rule Designer
skills.description: Create complex stateful D&R rules that correlate multiple events over time

skills.name: Cloud Security Monitor
skills.description: Set up cloud security monitoring for AWS, Azure, and GCP using adapters and cloud-specific rules

skills.name: Threat Intelligence Integrator
skills.description: Integrate and leverage threat intelligence from VirusTotal, GreyNoise, and other feeds in D&R rules

skills.name: Config Hive Manager
skills.description: Manage configuration storage including secrets, rules, and lookups in the Config Hive

skills.name: Sigma Rule Deployer
skills.description: Deploy and manage Sigma rules and other managed rulesets (Soteria, SOC Prime, Community)

skills.name: Infrastructure as Code
skills.description: Manage LimaCharlie organization configuration as code for repeatable deployments

skills.name: Forensic Analyst
skills.description: Conduct digital forensics analysis using memory dumps, process inspection, and timeline reconstruction

skills.name: Performance Optimizer
skills.description: Optimize LimaCharlie performance, reduce costs, and manage resource usage

installation.instructions: These skills are designed for use with Claude Code and Claude.ai. Each skill provides specialized guidance for working with different aspects of the LimaCharlie SecOps Cloud Platform.
requirements: Access to LimaCharlie documentation for reference

usage.overview: Skills will automatically activate when Claude detects you're working on related tasks. You can also manually invoke skills by mentioning the specific component or task.
examples: "Help me create a D&R rule to detect PowerShell execution" - activates dr-rule-builder
"How do I deploy sensors on Windows endpoints?" - activates sensor-manager
"I need to investigate this suspicious process" - activates threat-hunter or incident-responder
"Set up AWS CloudTrail monitoring" - activates cloud-security-monitor and adapter-configurator

categories_description.Core Platform Operations: Essential skills for deploying and managing sensors, adapters, and detection rules
categories_description.Data Operations: Skills for querying, collecting, and routing telemetry data
categories_description.Security Operations: Skills for threat hunting, incident response, and malware detection
categories_description.Development & Integration: Skills for building extensions, using APIs, and creating automation
categories_description.Advanced Features: Skills for complex stateful detection, cloud security, and threat intelligence
categories_description.Platform Management: Skills for configuration management, rulesets, and infrastructure as code
categories_description.Specialized Use Cases: Skills for digital forensics and performance optimization
